speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0068/2007 ) by Marie Panayotopoulous-Cassiotou, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on ‘promoting decent work for all’ ( 2006/2240(INI) ).
